Setting.name: NVTGC
Setting.Description: The NVTGC code for the site you would like the add-on to run for.

Setting.name: ProcessType
Setting.Description: The ProcessType to look for when identifying transactions to process.

Setting.name: TransactionStatus
Setting.Description: The TransactionStatus to look for when identifying transactions to process.

Setting.name: MatchString
Setting.Description: The query to use when identifying transactions to process.

Setting.name: NewProcessType
Setting.Description: The new ProcessType to set in the transaction during processing.

Setting.name: NewTransactionStatus
Setting.Description: The new TransactionStatus to set in the transaction during processing.
